amendment.description: Amendment sought to end the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account and to apply the nearly $1.5 billion in savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Department of Energy, Energy Programs, Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account by $1,450,960,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 275 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 275 (Roll no. 311).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. McClintock.
